# SkyStream - Effortless Real-Time Collaboration with WebRTC üåê
SkyStream makes remote collaboration effortless without the hassle with instant, secure screen sharing‚Äîno downloads or logins required! üåê‚ú® Integrated chat rooms enhance interaction, and a simple sign-in process ensures a personalized, seamless experience. Fast, secure, and accessible, SkyStream brings teams together effortlessly, anytime, anywhere. üöÄ

## Features üéØ
- üñ•Ô∏è Instantly share your screen‚Äîno logins, no downloads, just click and collaborate.
- üîê Enjoy secure connections, ensuring your sessions remain private and protected.
- üõ°Ô∏è Safeguard your data with advanced privacy measures throughout the session.
- üåç Access SkyStream from any device with a web browser, anytime, anywhere.
- üì± Join effortlessly by scanning a QR code‚Äîsimple and seamless.
- üí¨ Engage in real-time discussions with integrated chat rooms for enhanced collaboration.
- ‚ú® Personalize your experience with a quick sign-in for secure, tailored sessions.
- ‚öôÔ∏è Experience fast, responsive sharing optimized for real-time collaboration.
- ‚è±Ô∏è Minimal latency ensures every interaction feels smooth and uninterrupted.
- üöÄ Simplified setup means more time spent working together and less time on tech hassles.

## Demo üñ•Ô∏è
You can visit the live site here - https://sky-stream-share.vercel.app/

## Technologies Used üë®üèª‚Äçüíª
- **React.js** ‚Äì A powerful JavaScript library for building fast and scalable web applications.
- **Tailwind CSS** ‚Äì A utility-first CSS framework for efficient and responsive styling.
- **SCSS** ‚Äì A preprocessor for CSS to enhance styling capabilities.
- **Docker** ‚Äì Containerization for seamless deployment and scalability.
- **Firebase** ‚Äì Used for authentication, backend functions and Firestore.
- **ShadCN** ‚Äì Used for beautifully designed, responsive components.

## Installation üõ†Ô∏è
- First Read this [License](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/SkyStream/blob/main/LICENSE) & their terms then proceed.
- Star the [Repository](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/SkyStream)
- Clone the repository:
```bash
  git clone https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/SkyStream.git
```
- Install the necessary dependencies:
```bash
  pnpm install
```

## Usage üñ•Ô∏è
- Start the development server
```bash
   pnpm run dev
 ```
- Open your browser and navigate to http://localhost:5173 to view the localhost website

## Project Setup Using Docker Containerization:
1. Start the Docker Engine Locally or Use Any Service
2. Navigate to the project Root directory:
```bash
    cd SkyStream
```
3. Run DockerFile:
```bash
    docker-compose up --build
```
4. Wait for Generating the Image
<details>	
 <summary><b>How Docker Image Builds Looks</b></summary><br>

  ![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/9873d1e2-ca40-4909-98c4-eacdf0d1e1a8)
</details>
<details>	
 <summary><b>Project Docker Container</b></summary><br>

  ![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/aa315263-21d1-4365-93dc-056a5af4eb10)
</details>

5. Now Simply use the Project using Docker Container
